titleStmt.title: That the lawful successor cannot be debarr'd from succeeding to the crown maintain'd against Dolman, Buchannan, and others / by George Mackenzie ...
titleStmt.author: Mackenzie, George, Sir, 1636-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: R. Doleman was the pseudonym of Robert Parsons.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
